page.title: 01OVERVIEW : CANNICH AREA
page.content: This rural area lays no great claim to fame but the key factors of the live- lihood and{life style}of the local residents of Cannich lie in the surrounding area. {Tourism,}livestock {farming,}fishing, deer stalking, forestry and the nearby{Fasnakyle {Power Station}supplying power to the National Grid and providing{employ- {ment}for about 20 local residents are all contributing factors to the life style and livelihood of people living in the Cannich area. There is one{primary school}with 2 teachers which serves a 20 mile radius. There is an active{community council}in the area. {Law and order}is kept by one police constable living in the village who in an emergency would request assistance from the section sergeant at Beauly (15 miles distant).
